"He either misspoke or was not being honest with me a week ago last Wednesday when he said they would not be getting involved," Reid said.

Here is the part that scares me:
 
 
Far from it, we're going to have a very active Senate.

 
 I prefer do nothing politicians. The last thing we need is a very active senate. Why can't we ever elect congressmen who say "we have been making new laws every year for the last 250. We have over 300,000,000 of them. I am just going to kick back and vote against everything that comes along. Enough is enough."
 
 But no, we can't get folks like that, we have folks who promise a very active senate.
